node.title: England needs 300 more runs to put pressure back on Australia, Dawid Malan says
node.alt: Dawid Malan of England battling during day three of the First Test Match in the Ashes series between Australia and England
node.description: England batter Dawid Malan says England needs 300 more runs to be in with a chance of pulling off a historic Ashes recovery at the Gabba.
node.content:
["England needs\u00a0another 250\u00a0to 300 runs to have any chance of upsetting Australia in the first Test at the Gabba, batter Dawid Malan says.", "England's hard-fought\u00a0revival on the third day was led by Malan and skipper Joe Root, whose\u00a0159-run partnership saw the visitors recover from 2-61 to reach 2-220 at the close, 58 runs behind Australia's first innings score.", "Malan said it was \"vitally important\" to put up a good performance after a calamitous first day in which England was bowled out for just 147, having won the toss.", "\"The first innings was obviously a disappointment,\" Malan said.", "\"So for us to come in after a day-and-a-half of hard fielding and to do what we did here today was fantastic.\u00a0", "\"But that's only half the job done. We need another 250, 300 runs tomorrow to put ourselves in a good position.\"", "", "
Dawid Malan and Joe Root combined for 159 crucial runs on day three.(AAP: Dave Hunt)
", "After losing Rory Burns and Haseeb Hameed relatively cheaply in their bid to avoid a catastrophic innings defeat, ticketholders would have been tentatively making plans for a free weekend.", "However, Malan and Root's superb partnership helped give England fans hope of a miraculous recovery.", "\"We spoke this morning about making sure we go out and express ourselves,\" Malan said.\u00a0", "\"The last thing we want to do is\u00a0be sitting ducks and go out and not score.", "\"After what we did in the first innings, we almost needed to park that and put it aside.\u00a0This needed to be a fresh innings.", "\"I know it's really, probably, poor\u00a0of me to say that\u00a0in a Test match we started so badly that we just need to park it, but the only way forward in this Test was to actually forget what happened in that first innings.\"", "
First hour 'really important' tomorrow morning
", "", "
For the first time in the series, Australia was left looking for answers, and Josh Hazlewood was surprisingly not one of them.(Getty Images: Albert Perez - CA)
", "Despite being brought back down to earth after two exceptional days of play, Australian batter Marnus Labuschagne said\u00a0the mood in the Australian dressing room was \"very calm\".", "\"Test cricket is a grind, it's meant to be hard, otherwise it wouldn't mean so much to both countries.", "\"For us, it's just a day at the office and we make sure we come back tomorrow and review our plans and how we bowled today and come up with some ideas and get those last eight wickets.\"", "Labuschagne said he was unaware of any issue that would have kept Josh Hazlewood \u2014\u00a0surprisingly unused after tea \u2014\u00a0from bowling, other than to keep him fresh.", "He said the second new ball, due in 10 overs' time, would be hugely important tomorrow morning.", "\"Playing a lot of cricket here at the Gabba, the new ball is crucial.\u00a0", "\"If we can put that new ball in the right areas and get some wickets with the new ball, it can really turn quickly.", "\"The key for us is just to keep building pressure.\"", "Malan said how England resumed\u00a0tomorrow would\u00a0be vital, but it was important not to think too far ahead.", "", "
England need another big partnership in order to have any chance, Dawid Malan said.(AAP: Dave Hunt)
", "\"As soon as we think too far ahead, you open a door for them, and they are so brilliant at closing that door for us,\" he said.", "\"So I think the first hour is really important for us tomorrow, and then we can start thinking about how well we can play.", "\"But we need one more good, hundred-run partnership to put a good score on the board, and then, who knows what can happen.\"", "England skipper Root will be hoping to convert his score into yet another hundred to add to the six he's already scored in a stellar 2021 season \u2014\u00a0and if he continues where he left off on Friday, odds are he'll get there.", "His unbeaten\u00a086 on Friday featured a full repertoire of shots that saw the 30-year-old Yorkshireman\u00a0score to all corners of the ground.", "", "
Joe Root played yet another invaluable innings for England.(Getty:\u00a0Bradley Kanaris)
", "After a nine-ball duck in the first innings, this was a return to the form that has seen him 67 over the past year, as well as being enough to take him\u00a0past\u00a01,500 Test runs for the calendar year, the first Englishman to do so.", "Labuschagne said Root was a \"beautiful player of spin bowling and pace bowling\" but he was not there to sit back and watch.\u00a0", "\"It's not my job now to admire Joe Root's innings, it's my job to find holes in his game and try and help the team out wherever I can for us to get a wicket somewhere and get him out.", "\"The Ashes is on the line here and we've got to make sure we keep putting pressure on him.\""]
